text: Looks like I hit a current limitation of the secrets manager. I am building an extension that interacts with the <http://monday.com|monday.com> API and they have 225 character API tokens. Any chance this will be upped soon?

Hi Reed - there is an upcoming change that will be released within a month to remove limits for secrets. In the meanwhile, we recommend that you split your secrets into two and store the halves into two different secrets and concatenate them!

Hello amazing beta participants! If any of you are attending INBOUND, please fill out this <https://forms.gle/6eetSDwQTCRiarLaA|extremely short form> - we have something special we'd like to invite you to.

Got it!
Ahh ok, thatâ€™s smart. I was going to use AWS or some other thing to store them, but splitting them will be much easier. Thanks!
